item.title: Cronjobs using Helm Charts
item.description: Imagine you’re debugging your application, and you’ve defined your cronjobs within your code - you are relying on a library/package to schedule your jobs - and then it runs locally without you realizing and your co-workers are left wondering why certain actions got triggered so quickly. In some instances this might not be a huge issue, but the project I worked on had cron jobs to track payments and update their states, hence it wasn’t a good idea to have a library schedule our cron jobs.
